permissions.explanation: reports attribution data back to Bing servers

ti.helpText: The UET Tag ID is the unique identifier of your UET tag. [Learn more](https://help.ads.microsoft.com/apex/index/3/en/56705)

evt.helpText: Choose between tracking a page load or a custom event

ea.helpText: The type of user interaction you want to track. For example, `play` or `pause`. [Learn more](https://help.ads.microsoft.com/#apex/ads/en/56717/2-500)

ec.helpText: The category of event you want to track. For example, `video`.

ev.helpText: A numerical value associated with that event. For example, the length of the video played.

el.helpText: The name of the element that caused the action. For example, `trailer` or `behindthescenes`

gv.helpText: Enter the revenue value of the event you want to track.

gvc.helpText: Enter the currency of the event you want to track.

__setting_ecommerce.helpText: Enable forwarding of E-commerce API events to Bing UET as part of the enhanced e-commerce tracking feature. [Learn more](https://about.ads.microsoft.com/en-au/blog/post/april-2015/e-commerce-revenue-tracking-with-universal-event-tracking)
